mapper.insert:
insert into nyt_fact_info ( ID, CHANGE_FLAG, FACTDESCRIPTION, LAW, P_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, REMARKS, tongID, IS_DELETE ) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.changeFlag}, #{item.factdescription}, #{item.law}, #{item.pId}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.remarks}, #{item.tongid}, #{item.isDelete} )
